Title: Relates to the prohibition on naming buildings after public officials
Summary: Prohibits a public officer or member of the legislature from have a building or space named after themself while holding public office based on the fact that such person was responsible for securing public funds for the person or entity involved in naming the building or for securing public funds for the person's or entity's cause or agenda.
LawCode: Add ยง79-a, Pub Off L; add ยง7-h, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the legislative law, in relation to the prohibition of naming buildings after public officials
